명작 하프라이프2의 결말 이후 부분을 다룬 에피소드 중 첫번째 에피소드 입니다. 저도 하프라이프2 결말이 끝인줄 알았는데 공식 에피소드가 2개나 더 있어서 바로 플레이했습니다. 분량은 조금 적긴 하지만 결말 이후의 이야기를 알 도 있고 다시한번 프리맨 박사로 무쌍을 찍을 수 있어서 재미있게 플레이했습니다. 게임 퀄리티는 하프라이프2와 동일하게 디테일이 살아있고 좋습니다.
i got all the achievements, i know, nobody cares, but i wanted to tell more people about it,

Jak powiedziałem w mojej recenzji Half-Life 2, gra mi się spodobała. Nie inaczej było z tym samodzielnym dodatkiem do ów gry. Bawiłem się zadziwiająco dobrze, pomimo utrudnienia które sam na siebie nałożyłem (trofeum aby przejść grę używając jedynie jednego pocisku). Było przyjemnie, ale krótko, jest to rozrywka na jeden wieczór. Mimo wszystko zalecam przejście ponieważ otrzymujemy w tym dodatku kontynuację fabuły z podstawki. 
Jeżeli chodzi o właściwą ocenę, jest ona taka sama jak w przypadku 2, może nawet troszeczkę lepsza.
Gorąco polecam i lecę ograć chapter 2!

An amazing follow-up of the original Half Life 2. And has expected... a cliffhanger at the end! Once again, an unique an amazing game that didn't lose his touch after almost one decade.

it is my favorite game. The theme is a dystopia caused by an alien invasion, with the scenery based loosely on some eastern-european country in te times of communism, with some old cars, etc. Really scary. The physics of the game such as the "gravity gun" were really revolutionary at the time. Still, on 2021, I highly recommend the Half-life 2 series.

Half life 2 den sonra daha karanlık ve korkunç bir ortama giriyorsunuz. Bilim kurgu  şeylerine daha çok giriyor. Kısa sürüyor zaten, 3-4 saat. Şimdiye kadar defalarca bitirdim, hatta bunu yazınca tekrar canım çekti, seriye tekrar başlamak lazım :P

Oyunun ortalama süresi 3 saat, ve bu oyun için 18 lira bayılıyoruz. Oyun sanki demo gibi kısa gereksiz aksiyon sahneleri ile 3 saate çıkarılmış sadece, onlarda olmasa 2 saat olurdu zaten. İndirimli fiyatıyla alırsanız güzel.
A legendary sequel, no less legendary game)

Данный Эпизод самый короткий и не блещет чем-то новым, но она способна затянуть и посмотреть по глубже на конфликт между Альянса с Повстанцами, где творятся кровопролитные уличные сражении, где Сопротивление пытается эвакуироваться с города, а Альянс всяческиии ценой своей жизни этому мешает. Игра хоть и короткая, но увлекательная, но всё же за то что нет ничего особого нового я занижу не много оценку. Ставлю оценку 9 из 10
感觉比半条命2本体要好

Как продолжение любимой серии - пусть будет. Отдельно - не айс. Короткий эпизод про городские бои и только. Порой не прохожу в цепочке серии из-за её однообразности и бессмысленности. А жаль. Эпизод действительно можно было сделать классно, ведь тема городских боёв редко раскрывается.

A pretty good sequel to Half Life 2. But I think that Episode 2 is so much better, and I haven't played it on this account yet.

Who would've thought that refusing to pick up a can would lead to the destruction of a major city and the headquarters of an alien occupying force.

10/10 would refuse again.
I love the extension to the California sim, really explains the story more

Half Life 2: Episode One is a fun standalone sequel/expansion that's takes as long as Half Life's Blue Shift to complete although not as difficult even on normal difficulty & while doing the "The One Free Bullet" achievement 😎

This reminded me of DLC "Blue Shift" for Half-Life 1: short duration, the same enemies, weapons, and mechanics as in the original game. The only difference is that it's not a different story from the perspective of another character, but it continues the story that ended in HL2. And compared to HL2 we are not alone this time in our journey! Also, I should mention the dark level where you have to use your flashlight to see the way you go, very immersive. 
Overall it is once again one of the greatest games I've ever played and enjoyed playing every minute of it (except for the final escort routine).
Good game just like Half Life 2 but the story continues, wish it was longer. It is worth buying!!!
